description:
Gears Designer for WebOS is an Engineering tool.
It calculates all dimensions and transferred output power of a spur gearing system.
A strength check can also be performed based on tooth stress and fatigue effects. It includes a list of the most widely used materials for the manufacture of gears.
GD works offline, your WebOS device makes all the calculations.
Results are based on ISO 6336.
The application works  only with Metric system.
GD is free!
New version 1.1.2
* Added new feature to generate reports and send them by email from the results views.
* Added Life Factor calculation.
* Fixed problem affecting Dynamic Factor values.
New in version 1.1.3
  * Fixed rounding problem causing wrong dimensions in helical gears.
versionNote: * Fixed rounding problem causing wrong dimensions in helical gears.
